testcase.classname: As a user, I want to be able to delete the information of the address in my profile with the specified
testcase.name: The deletion of the address record via the API should be confirmed through the API itself.
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "customer" token............passed * The api user sets "api/profile/customerDetailsAddress" path parameters....passed * The api user prepares a GET request containing the Deleted 170 to send to the api profile customerDetailsAddress endpoint..passed * The api user records the response from the api profile customerDetailsAddress endpoint and confirms that the status code is '404' and the reason phrase is Not Found..passed
